vignette.name: Opening Patches
vignette.bodytext: There are three ways to open a patch:

ul.li: Double-click on the patch from within the file_browser
Choose Open... from the File menu
Use the Finder or Windows Explorer to open the file

vignette.bodytext: When you use another application to open a patcher file, it can't be guaranteed that the correct version of Max will be launched. Normally, you'll have both an editing version and a Runtime version of Max installed, and sometimes the Runtime version will be launched by mistake.
